resources.string: Each time 10 questions are randomly generated. Period progress will increase if answered correctly!
At the moment quiz contains 325 questions!
Do you really want to exit?
Your knowledge is just terrific!\nYou should definitely think about paleontological career?
Great result, close to the perfection!
Really good result! Rotated infinity sign shows, that there is always room to improve!
Lucky number! I think, this is a good sign!
More than half, better than nothing!
University students really want this mark, but you can be better!
Well, it is not a Soviet Union or France, four is not a great mark!
I think you should try better!
Two is a sign, that you should consider studying more!
Unfortunately, it doesn\'t mean that you are first..
